EmailTemplate.subject: The future is what we all make it—a small gift for your company
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
As we all work through these current challenges, we know that a bright, optimistic future is ahead. We stand ready to support you as you return to flying.
I’ve found in work and home life that learning a new skill or hobby and educating myself in new areas bring optimism and exciting anticipation, and they always seem to be worthwhile endeavors. Honeywell wanted to share this philosophy with you by providing a small gift: a year’s subscription to MasterClass for your company. You can benefit from this learning platform or perhaps gift it to an inspirational employee or colleague on your team.
In this environment, transforming the future means learning and changing what we can today, and we’re honored to include you as part of this.
CLAIM GIFT {{lead.ABM Masterclass Link}}
With warm regards,
Bill Kircos Vice President, Customer Marketing Honeywell Aerospace
Our company is committed to integrity and upholding the highest ethical values. In compliance with our own policies and procedures on offering hospitality and in line with global anti-bribery and corruption laws, the intent and purpose of this gift is to build and maintain strong business relationships with your company and is expressly not offered with any expectation in respect of obtaining or seeking to obtain undue influence or advantage.
